nodes.val: cnt = Count the color types in input_grid,return the number of color kind(input_grid)

ans_grid = generate a new 3*3 black grid. If cnt is one, make the top 3 squares gray. If cnt is 2, make a diagonal line from top left to bottom right gray, again 3 pixels. If cnt is 3, make a diagonal line from top right to bottom left gray, again 3 pixels.(cnt)
